item.description:
Details:

Saturday May 30 - 2:00

Wallum Pond is located in Douglas, MA and the pond itself bisects both MA and RI. The launch is located off of Wallum Lake Road, meet by 1:45, we will launch at 2:00.

For details on the pond, please read the following:
http://www.mass.gov/d...

I think there will be a fee to park ($5?), will find out for sure soon...

Directions:

(From Worcester) I-395 South to Exit 2 (Rt 16). Follow Rt 16 East until you pass through Douglas State Park. Take a right onto Cedar Street and at the end continue going straight onto Wallum Lake Road. Park entrance will be up ahead on the right.

Alternately, you can also take Rt 146 South to the Lackey Damn Rd exit. Please consult mapquest though for details.
item.name: Wallum Pond - Douglas, MA
